name: SpaceOS
description:
Welcome to SpaceOS, intern! I know it may be cramped in there, with only a tiny amount of storage space... but you'll figure it out!

SpaceOS is a virtual desktop puzzle Game Jam game created for the BenBonk GameJam #2.

With only a couple megabytes of storage at your disposal, you need to get creative! Install and uninstall different programs in combination and figure out how to complete each task on the list provided.

Good luck!
